Parameters: the data point for this event
onEvent(com.google.android.gms.fitness.d.Description: Handle a new data point from the data source. The data point's @B_com#google#android#gms#fitness#data#DataType_E@ describes the format and meaning of its values.

ClassDesc: Listener for data source events, used by clients wanting to subscribe to real-time data stream updates. Each event is delivered as a @B_com#google#android#gms#fitness#data#DataPoint_E@. The listener is used both when adding a registration and when removing it. The same listener can be used for multiple registrations.
